messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: Brexit means controlling our borders, seas, laws, trade and money. Only UKIP will deliver a full Brexit. Radical Islam is as hostile to British society today as Communism ever was. Only UKIP will reclaim British culture and identity by tackling vital issues such as FGM, Sharia Law, face veils and 'honour' violence. The conventional family is the foundation of a free and flourishing society and the best place for the nurture of our children. Only UKIP will protect and promote the family.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver a full Brexit by controlling borders, seas, laws, trade and money.
Address issues related to radical Islam by tackling FGM, Sharia Law, face veils and 'honour' violence.
Protect and promote the conventional family as the foundation of a free and flourishing society.

community.content: The conventional family is the foundation of a free and flourishing society and the best place for the nurture of our children. Only UKIP will protect and promote the family.
